meanings.definition: The posterior part of the alimentary canal, including the colon and rectum.
meanings.sent1: After digesting food, it moves through the hindguts for further processing.
meanings.sent2: The hindguts play a crucial role in the final stages of digestion.
meanings.sent3: The hindguts were having a party, celebrating the successful digestion process.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the hindguts, quietly working to complete the task.
meanings.sent5: The hindguts, like a diligent worker, diligently process waste to keep the body healthy.

meanings.definition: The caudal part of the digestive tract in certain invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: In some invertebrates, the hindguts help in the absorption of nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the hindguts of various invertebrates to understand their digestive systems.
meanings.sent3: The hindguts of the tiny insects were like a bustling marketplace, absorbing all they could.
meanings.sent4: The hindguts of the earthworms were a hidden treasure trove of nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The hindguts of the invertebrates were a vital link in their digestive chain.
